original: Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁akusal aṃ ▁dassanena ▁pahātabb aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na akusal o ▁na dassan ena ▁pahātabb o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁ adhipatiyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁akusal aṃ ▁bhāvanāya ▁pahātabb aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na akusal o ▁nabhāvanāya ▁pahātabb o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁ adhipatiyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nanevadassanena
analyzed: ▁abyākat aṃ ▁nevadassanena ▁nabhāvanāya ▁pahātabb aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paccayā ▁na a byākat o ▁nan eva dassan ena

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
